title: I have 3 months left for my class 10 boards.Can someone give me tips for scoring 95% above? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do not focus on the result and just enjoy the process… give yourself realistic goals and study everyday… make sure you study for at least 3 hours minimum per day in the following pattern 45 minutes of study 10 minutes recollection and 5 minutes breaks… Keep yourself well hydrated, and eat healthy food.. Avoid oily foods as they can make you drowsy… Try to put in one hour of study early in the morning… fix your hard subject for this hour as this is the time your brain is most receptive.. Make flash cards and colour code your subjects… if you are a matriculation student try to understand the key words rather than mugging them up as that way you will remember it easier and even if you do forget you won't get stuck there… Write down and practice every single problem in your math book including all the examples as they will ask even those.. Before you mark the answers in the mcq at the back of the books photocopy those pages like multiple copies and keep them… then mark the answers and learn them… once a week test yourself on those mcq using the photocopies you have and get some family member to correct it…
